thread.title: Jeremy McConnell enjoys celebratory drink after revealing he IS the father of Stephanie Davis' baby
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell enjoys celebratory drink after revealing he IS the father of Stephanie Davis' baby

author: Lucy Buckland
title: Jeremy McConnell enjoys celebratory drink after revealing he IS the father of Stephanie Davis' baby
text:
Jeremy McConnell enjoys celebratory drink after revealing he IS the father of Stephanie Davis' baby The reality hunk was spotted enjoying with pals hours after confirming he's Caben-Albi's dad Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jeremy McConnell has been pictured having what appeared to be a celebratory drink after announcing he is the father of Stephanie Davis' newborn son. 
Just hours after he took to social media to share the happy news, the reality star was spotted at Dublin bar Hog and Heffers with pals. 
According to OK!, Jeremy couldn't wipe the smile from his face as he chatted to friends. 
However, Jeremy is still yet to meet his son despite sharing the Instagram snap of the newborn, captioning it "my world." 
Over the weekend, Irish hunk Jez shared the adorable picture of Caben-Albi, who was born on January 13th, with fans immediately thinking he had taken it himself. 
But Jeremy, 27, posted the picture after he took off him from ex Stephanie Davis private social media account. 
A source close to the Jeremy said they were in discussions about the future but admitted his post is very misleading as he definitely hasn't met his newborn son. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell met in CBB last year (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) 
Twitter went into meltdown after Jez posted an adorable picture of his son, alongside the message: "Happiest man alive , my new focus", causing speculaytion over whether a DNA test had been returned. 
But other sources maintain that Jeremy will do anything to meet his son. 
They said: "Jeremy every intention of meeting of his son as soon as possible - any suggestion otherwise is nonsense." 
There has been no official statement from either camp on Caben-Albi's paternity, but Steph has always insisted he was the father. 
The tattooed hunk met the former Hollyoaks actress last year when they both took part in Celebrity Big Brother . 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour a few months later. Read More Jeremy shared this picture of Caben-Albi 
Steph soon found out she was pregnant and at the time, Jeremy said it wasn't true. 
He then denied the baby was his when it became obvious she was expecting, and said he wanted a paternity test. 
However, it now seems like Jeremy is making it clear that he is the father and that little Caben will be part of his life. 
It comes after Stephanie Davis deleted any trace of the statement she put out after her ex, Jeremy McConnell , took swabs for a DNA test on live TV. 
Following the This Morning segment last Thursday, during which Jeremy opened up about not being there for Steph throughout her pregnancy, the ex-Hollyoaks star had tweeted a statement about Jez's treatment of her. 
She said she felt "humiliated" by the way in which Jeremy demanded to know whether he was the father of her newborn baby, Caben-Albi, and said he had ruined her pregnancy. Read More
